data.eml:eml: New genus and species of Hexagenitidae (Insecta: Ephemeroptera) from Yixian Formation, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huang, Jiandong, Ren, Dong, Shih, Chungkun (2007): New genus and species of Hexagenitidae (Insecta: Ephemeroptera) from Yixian Formation, China. Zootaxa 1629: 39-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.179369
